title: Tarea principal: Planea un viaje a medellín, Colombia de fin de semana
description: Planea un viaje a medellín, Colombia de fin de semana
intro: In planning a weekend trip to Medellín, Colombia, several distinct functional areas can be identified to effectively organize the tasks involved. I have divided the task into a practical number of functional areas to ensure that each area has a clear set of responsibilities, leading to the creation of a detailed travel plan.

subtasks.title: Destination Research
subtasks.description: Researching and selecting key destinations and attractions in Medellín for the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A list of must-visit places and activities in Medellín.
responsibilities: Identify popular tourist attractions in Medellín.
Research local events or festivals happening during the weekend.

subtasks.title: Accommodation and Transportation
subtasks.description: Handling all aspects related to booking accommodation and arranging transportation for the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmed hotel reservations and a transportation plan.
responsibilities: Find and book a suitable hotel or accommodation in Medellín.
Arrange transportation to and from the airport and within the city.

subtasks.title: Budget Planning
subtasks.description: Managing the budget for the trip, including expenses for accommodation, transportation, food, and activities.
subtasks.expected_output: A detailed budget breakdown for the weekend trip.
responsibilities: Estimate costs for accommodation, transportation, and meals.
Allocate funds for entrance fees to attractions and other activities.

subtasks.title: Itinerary Development
subtasks.description: Creating a detailed itinerary outlining the schedule of activities and sightseeing for the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A day-by-day plan with timings and locations for each activity.
responsibilities: Plan daily activities, considering travel time between locations.
Include time for relaxation and exploring the city at leisure.

subtasks.title: Packing List Preparation
subtasks.description: Compiling a list of essential items to pack for the weekend trip to Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: A comprehensive packing list tailored to the specific needs of the trip.
responsibilities: Consider the weather forecast and pack appropriate clothing.
Include necessary travel documents, medications, and personal items in the list.
